ComicInfo.Title: Tiny Terror Tales #2: The Damned; Election Night
ComicInfo.Summary: It's election time, but Cerebus doesn't want to see his potential voters. But Bran convinces him to go out, and Cerebus does and sees Elrod there. Also, Lord Julius' goat gets an early lead in the election, but by the end of this issue, it ends up as a tie, but there's a missing vote ...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-17 11:25:09. [CVDB122502] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 16:13:51. [Issue ID 175316]
